nodes.text: Idau was a male Ithorian who was present at Tansarii Point Station during the Galactic Civil War. Around 1 ABY, he expressed frustration at a broken clone terminal.

Idau appears as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
